data.title: spaCy Server
data.slogan: ðŸ¦œ Containerized HTTP API for spaCy NLP
data.description: For developers who need programming language agnostic NLP, spaCy Server is a containerized HTTP API that provides industrial-strength natural language processing. Unlike other servers, our server is fast, idiomatic, and well documented.
code_example: curl http://localhost:8080/ner -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"sections": ["My name is John Doe. I grew up in California."]}'
data.author: Neel Kamath
